text: Seofonfealde gifa sind Haliges gastes; and seofon stapas sindon ciriclicra grada & haligra hada; and sifon siðan Godes þeowas sculon hergan dæghwamlice on circan & for eal Cristen folc þingian georne.
And eallum Godes freondum gebirað swiðe rihte, þæt hi Godes cirican lufian & wurðian & Godes þeowas friðian & nerian.
And se þe heom gederige mid worde oððe weorce, seofonfealdre bote gebete hit georne be þam þe seo dæd sy, gif he Godes miltse geearnian wille.
Forðam halidom & hadas & gehalgode Godes hus a man sceal for Godes ege wurðian georne.
And to hadbote, gif liflire wurðe, toeacan þam rihtwere, þone forman stæpe bete man mid punde & mid godcundre bote þingige georne.
And to hadbote, gif feorhlira wurðe, toeacan þam rihtwere, æt þam oðrum stæpe twa pund to bote mid godcundran scrifte.
And to hadbote, gif fulbrice wyrðe, toeacan þam rihtwere, æt þam þriddan stæpe þreo pund to bote mid godcundan scrifte.
And to hadbote, gif fulbryce wyrðe, toeacan þam rihtwere, æt þam feorðan stæpe feower pund to bote, mid godcundan scrifte.
And to hadbote gif fulbrice wyrðe, æt þam V stæpe V pund to bote, mid godcundan scrifte.
And to hadbote, gif fulbrice wurðe, toeacan þam rihtwere, æt þam VI stæpe VI pund to bote, mid godcundan scrifte.
And to hadbote, gif fulbrice wurðe, toeacan þam rihtwere, æt þam seofoðan stæpe VII pund to bote, mid godcundan scrifte.
And to hadbote, þar sambryce wyrðe, bete man georne be ðam þe seo dæd sy.
And hadbot mid rihte an dæl þam biscope, oðer þam wibede & þridde geferscipe.
Aa sceal mid rihte dom æfter dæde & medemung be mæðe for Gode & for worlde.
And wise wæran worldwitan, þe to godcundan rihtlagan þas laga setton, folce for steore, & halidom & hadas for Godes lufan wurðodon & Godes hus & Godes þeowas deoplice griðedon.
